titleStmt.title: [To the kings most excellent majesty. The humble address of your most loyal ... subjects ... of] Hereford
titleStmt.author: Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: Sheet cropped with loss of text.
In two columns. Left is address of Hereford; right is address of city of Gloucester. Cf. National Library of Scotland.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
